1_1P1Z6QcGaehuexRE5s8AcDnVi7ykErBMSG.body:
Hi! Your site is missing the folder **data/users** and the file **data/users/content.json**. Let us know if you need help. 

**Guide - How to clone the nullchan image board:** 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/zupport.bit/?/zupport/thread/60c4680da68c0c271b2ba411e3c83b71

At the end, you have to sign the "inner path" first and then the whole site: 

**python zeronet.py siteSign 15rc8uWkz14xXPtSbRK7dNbsQMHonzWdqq --inner_path data/users/content.json**

**python zeronet.py siteSign 15rc8uWkz14xXPtSbRK7dNbsQMHonzWdqq** 

Do you have done that? If yes, do it again (first the inner path and then the whole site). Maybe this will help.

Can you post the content of your **data/users/content.json** here: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/

If you replace it with the following content, it should work, I think. 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?1AmWymR6E7bWSWz3sSmDQpsbEUDWRz5otj_0

> [lily](#comment_4_1P1Z6QcGaehuexRE5s8AcDnVi7ykErBMSG): How do I know if it worked?

If you are able to post images, and other people can see them, then it's working.
Do you have already posted something?

Can you replace the content of the file content.json (in your root folder) with the following and then sign and publish: 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?1AmWymR6E7bWSWz3sSmDQpsbEUDWRz5otj_1
If there are errors during the signing, there's something wrong.
Are you currently seeding the site?

Yeah, something seems to be broken. If I open your site, the file **data/users/content.json** is missing, although zeronet doesn't report it. I have contacted the admin from zupport.bit, maybe he can help.
